entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , L'Assomption
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:31 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: L'Assomption 08:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Temperature: -11.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 65 %

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Snow and local blowing snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 13.
